s.label: Sky model settings
s.desc: These parameters are used to specify the content of the sky model.

s.label: OSKAR sky model file(s)
s.description: Paths to one or more OSKAR sky model text or binary files. See the accompanying documentation for a description of an OSKAR sky model file.

s.label: GSM file
s.desc: Path to a Global Sky Model file, pixellated using the HEALPix RING scheme. This option can be used to load a GSM data file produced from software written by Angelica de Oliveira, available at https://www.cfa.harvard.edu/~adeolive/gsm/

s.label: Input FITS file(s)
s.desc: FITS file(s) to use as a sky model.

s.label: Downsample factor
s.desc: The factor by which to downsample the pixel grid.

s.label: Minimum fraction of peak
s.desc: The minimum allowed pixel value, as a fraction of the peak value in the image.

s.label: "Noise floor [Jy/PIXEL]
s.desc: The noise floor of the image, in Jy/PIXEL.

s.label: Spectral index
s.desc: The spectral index of each pixel.

s.label: Input HEALPix FITS file
s.desc: Paths to one or more HEALPix FITS files, ordered using the HEALPix RING scheme (NEST schemes are not supported).

s.label: Coordinate system
s.desc: The spherical coordinate system used for the HEALPix representation.

s.label: Map units
s.type: mK/sr (Temperature per steradian), K/sr (Temperature per steradian), Jy/pixel (Jansky per pixel)
s.desc: The physical units of pixels in the input map.

s.label: Number of sources
s.desc: Number of sources scattered approximately uniformly over the sphere (before filtering). A value greater than 0 will activate the random power-law generator.

s.label: Flux density min [Jy]
s.desc: Minimum flux density in the random distribution, in Jy (before filtering).

s.label: Flux density max [Jy]
s.desc: Maximum flux density in the random distribution, in Jy (before filtering).

s.label: Power law index
s.desc: Power law exponent describing number per unit flux density.

s.label: Random seed
s.desc: Random number generator seed used for random distributions.

s.label: Number of sources
s.desc: Number of sources scattered approximately uniformly over the sphere (before filtering). A value greater than 0 will activate the random broken-power-law generator.

s.label: Flux density min [Jy]
s.desc: Minimum flux density in the random distribution, in Jy (before filtering).

s.label: Flux density max [Jy]
s.desc: Maximum flux density in the random distribution, in Jy (before filtering).

s.label: Power law index 1
s.desc: Power law exponent describing number per unit flux density in region 1.

s.label: Power law index 2
s.desc: Power law exponent describing number per unit flux density in region 2.

s.label: Threshold [Jy]
Random seed
s.desc: Random number generator seed used for random distributions.

s.label: Side length of grid
s.desc: Side length of the generated grid. A value greater than 0 will activate the grid generator.

s.label: Field-of-view [deg]
s.desc: Field-of-view spanned by the grid centre, in degrees.

s.label: Mean Stokes I flux [Jy].
s.desc: The mean of generated Stokes I fluxes, in Jy.

s.label: Standard deviation of Stokes I flux [Jy].
s.desc: The standard deviation of generated Stokes I fluxes, in Jy.

s.label: Random seed
s.desc: Random number generator seed used for random distributions.

s.label: Nside
s.desc: HEALPix Nside parameter. A value greater than 0 will activate the HEALPix generator, which will produce points evenly spaced over the whole sky. The total number of points is 12 * Nside * Nside.

s.label: Amplitude
s.desc: Amplitude assigned to generated HEALPix points, in Jy.

s.label: Override source spectral index values
s.desc: If true, override all source spectral index values using the parameters below.

s.label: Reference frequency [Hz]
s.desc: Reference frequency of all sources in the final sky model.

s.label: Spectral index mean
s.desc: Mean spectral index of all sources in the final sky model.

s.label: Spectral index std. dev.
s.desc: Standard deviation of spectral index values for all sources in the final sky model.

s.label: Random seed
s.desc: Random number generator seed used for random distributions.

s.label: Flux density min [Jy]
s.desc: Minimum flux density allowed by the filter, in Jy. Note that this filter is applied on a per-channel basis after scaling all source fluxes by the spectral index.

s.label: Flux density max [Jy]
s.desc: Maximum flux density allowed by the filter, in Jy. Note that this filter is applied on a per-channel basis after scaling all source flux values by the spectral index.

s.label: Remove failed Gaussian sources
s.desc: If true, remove (set to zero) sources for which Gaussian width parameter solutions have failed. This can occur for sources very far from the phase centre. If false (the default), sources with failed Gaussian parameter solutions are modelled as point sources.

s.label: Output OSKAR sky model binary file
s.desc: Path used to save the final sky model structure as an OSKAR binary file. Leave blank if not required.

s.label: Output OSKAR sky model text file
s.desc: Path used to save the final sky model structure as a text file (useful for debugging). Leave blank if not required.
